""SET NOCOUNT ON;
DECLARE @inserted0 TABLE ([Id] int, [_Position] [int]);
MERGE [Permissions] USING (
VALUES (@p0, @p1, @p2, @p3, @p4, @p5, 0),
(@p6, @p7, @p8, @p9, @p10, @p11, 1),
(@p12, @p13, @p14, @p15, @p16, @p17, 2),
(@p18, @p19, @p20, @p21, @p22, @p23, 3),

(@p30, @p31, @p32, @p33, @p34, @p35, 5),
(@p36, @p37, @p38, @p39, @p40, @p41, 6),
(@p42, @p43, @p44, @p45, @p46, @p47, 7),
(@p48, @p49, @p50, @p51, @p52, @p53, 8),
(@p54, @p55, @p56, @p57, @p58, @p59, 9),
(@p60, @p61, @p62, @p63, @p64, @p65, 10),
(@p66, @p67, @p68, @p69, @p70, @p71, 11),
(@p72, @p73, @p74, @p75, @p76, @p77, 12),
(@p78, @p79, @p80, @p81, @p82, @p83, 13),
(@p84, @p85, @p86, @p87, @p88, @p89, 14),
(@p90, @p91, @p92, @p93, @p94, @p95, 15),
(@p96, @p97, @p98, @p99, @p100, @p101, 16),
(@p102, @p103, @p104, @p105, @p106, @p107, 17),
(@p108, @p109, @p110, @p111, @p112, @p113, 18),
(@p114, @p115, @p116, @p117, @p118, @p119, 19),
(@p120, @p121, @p122, @p123, @p124, @p125, 20),
(@p126, @p127, @p128, @p129, @p130, @p131, 21),
(@p132, @p133, @p134, @p135, @p136, @p137, 22),
(@p138, @p139, @p140, @p141, @p142, @p143, 23),
(@p144, @p145, @p146, @p147, @p148, @p149, 24)) AS i ([CanCreate], [CanDelete], [CanRead], [CanUpdate], [FunctionId], [RoleId], _Position) ON 1=0
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ([CanCreate], [CanDelete], [CanRead], [CanUpdate], [FunctionId], [RoleId])
VALUES (i.[CanCreate], i.[CanDelete], i.[CanRead], i.[CanUpdate], i.[FunctionId], i.[RoleId])
OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position
INTO @inserted0;

SELECT [t].[Id] FROM [Permissions] t

""SELECT @__roleId_0 AS [RoleId], [f].[Id] AS [FunctionId], CASE
    WHEN [p].[Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([p].[CanCreate] = 1)
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END AS [CanCreate], CASE
    WHEN [p].[Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([p].[CanDelete] = 1)
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END AS [CanDelete], CASE
    WHEN [p].[Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([p].[CanRead] = 1)
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END AS [CanRead], CASE

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END AS [CanUpdate]
FROM [Functions] AS [f]

WHERE [p].[Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([p].[RoleId] = @__roleId_0)" (0723d8ff)

""SELECT @__roleId_0 AS [RoleId], [f].[Id] AS [FunctionId], CASE
    WHEN [p].[Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([p].[CanCreate] = 1)
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END AS [CanCreate], CASE
    WHEN [p].[Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([p].[CanDelete] = 1)
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END AS [CanDelete], CASE
    WHEN [p].[Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([p].[CanRead] = 1)
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END AS [CanRead], CASE
    WHEN [p].[Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([p].[CanUpdate] = 1)
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END AS [CanUpdate]

WHERE [p].[Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([p].[RoleId] = @__roleId_0)" (0723d8ff)

DECLARE @inserted25 TABLE ([Id] int, [_Position] [int]);
MERGE [Permissions] USING (
VALUES (@p25, @p26, @p27, @p28, @p29, @p30, 0),
(@p31, @p32, @p33, @p34, @p35, @p36, 1),
(@p37, @p38, @p39, @p40, @p41, @p42, 2),
(@p43, @p44, @p45, @p46, @p47, @p48, 3),
(@p49, @p50, @p51, @p52, @p53, @p54, 4),

(@p91, @p92, @p93, @p94, @p95, @p96, 11),
(@p97, @p98, @p99, @p100, @p101, @p102, 12),
(@p103, @p104, @p105, @p106, @p107, @p108, 13),
(@p109, @p110, @p111, @p112, @p113, @p114, 14),
(@p115, @p116, @p117, @p118, @p119, @p120, 15),
(@p121, @p122, @p123, @p124, @p125, @p126, 16),
(@p127, @p128, @p129, @p130, @p131, @p132, 17),
(@p133, @p134, @p135, @p136, @p137, @p138, 18),
(@p139, @p140, @p141, @p142, @p143, @p144, 19),
(@p145, @p146, @p147, @p148, @p149, @p150, 20),
(@p151, @p152, @p153, @p154, @p155, @p156, 21),
(@p157, @p158, @p159, @p160, @p161, @p162, 22),
(@p163, @p164, @p165, @p166, @p167, @p168, 23),
(@p169, @p170, @p171, @p172, @p173, @p174, 24)) AS i ([CanCreate], [CanDelete], [CanRead], [CanUpdate], [FunctionId], [RoleId], _Position) ON 1=0
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ([CanCreate], [CanDelete], [CanRead], [CanUpdate], [FunctionId], [RoleId])
VALUES (i.[CanCreate], i.[CanDelete], i.[CanRead], i.[CanUpdate], i.[FunctionId], i.[RoleId])
OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position
INTO @inserted25;

SELECT [t].[Id] FROM [Permissions] t
INNER JOIN @inserted25 i ON ([t].[Id] = [i].[Id])
ORDER BY [i].[_Position];" (0723d8ff)

""SELECT CASE
    WHEN EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM [Functions] AS [f]
        INNER JOIN [Permissions] AS [p] ON [f].[Id] = [p].[FunctionId]
        INNER JOIN [AspNetRoles] AS [r] ON [p].[RoleId] = [r].[Id]
        WHERE ([r].[Name] IN (N'Staff') AND ([f].[Id] = @__functionId_1)) AND ([p].[CanRead] = 1))
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END" (0723d8ff)

        INNER JOIN [Permissions] AS [p] ON [f].[Id] = [p].[FunctionId]
        INNER JOIN [AspNetRoles] AS [r] ON [p].[RoleId] = [r].[Id]
        WHERE ([r].[Name] IN (N'test') AND ([f].[Id] = @__functionId_1)) AND ([p].[CanUpdate] = 1))

END" (0723d8ff)

    INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [dtoBillDetail.Size0] ON [c.Bill.BillDetails0].[SizeId] = [dtoBillDetail.Size0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product0] ON [c.Bill.BillDetails0].[ProductId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory0] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product0].[CategoryId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [Colors] AS [dtoBillDetail.Color0] ON [c.Bill.BillDetails0].[ColorId] = [dtoBillDetail.Color0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [c1].[Id], [c.Bill1].[Id] AS [Id0]
        FROM [BillDetails] AS [c1]
        INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [c.Size1] ON [c1].[SizeId] = [c.Size1].[Id]
        INNER JOIN [Products] AS [c.Product1] ON [c1].[ProductId] = [c.Product1].[Id]
        INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [c.Product.ProductCategory1] ON [c.Product1].[CategoryId] = [c.Product.ProductCategory1].[Id]
        INNER JOIN [Colors] AS [c.Color1] ON [c1].[ColorId] = [c.Color1].[Id]
        INNER JOIN [Bills] AS [c.Bill1] ON [c1].[BillId] = [c.Bill1].[Id]
        WHERE [c1].[BillId] = @__billId_0
    ) AS [t0] ON [c.Bill.BillDetails0].[BillId] = [t0].[Id0]
) AS [t1] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId] = [t1].[Id2]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2]" (0723d8ff)

""SELECT CASE
    WHEN [x].[BillId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.Bill].[BillStatus], [x.Bill].[CustomerAddress], [x.Bill].[CustomerId], [x.Bill].[CustomerMessage], [x.Bill].[CustomerMobile], [x.Bill].[CustomerName], [x.Bill].[DateCreated], [x.Bill].[DateModified], [x].[BillId], [x.Bill].[PaymentMethod], [x.Bill].[Status], CASE
    WHEN [x].[ColorId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.Color].[Code], [x].[ColorId], [x.Color].[Name], [x].[Id], [x].[Price], CASE
    WHEN [x].[ProductId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.Product].[CategoryId], [x.Product].[Content], [x.Product].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated1], [x.Product].[DateModified] AS [DateModified1], [x.Product].[Description], [x.Product].[HomeFlag], [x.Product].[HotFlag], [x].[ProductId], [x.Product].[Image], [x.Product].[Name] AS [Name1], [x.Product].[OriginalPrice], [x.Product].[Price] AS [Price0], CASE

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id1], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Status] AS [Status0], [x.Product].[PromotionPrice], [x.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x.Product].[Status] AS [Status1], [x.Product].[Tags], [x.Product].[Unit], [x.Product].[ViewCount], [x].[Quantity], CASE
    WHEN [x].[SizeId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x].[SizeId], [x.Size].[Name] AS [Name2], [x.Bill].[Id]
FROM [BillDetails] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [x.Size] ON [x].[SizeId] = [x.Size].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Products] AS [x.Product] ON [x].[ProductId] = [x.Product].[Id]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.Product.ProductCategory] ON [x.Product].[CategoryId] = [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]

""SELECT [t1].[DateCreated], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Content], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[DateModified], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Description], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[HomeFlag], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[HotFlag], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Id] AS [Id2], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Image], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Name], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[OriginalPrice], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Price], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[PromotionPrice], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoAlias], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoDescription], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoKeywords], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoPageTitle], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Status], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Tags], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Unit], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[ViewCount]
FROM [Products] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [t0].[DateCreated], [t0].[Id], [x.BillDetails0].[Id] AS [Id0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory0].[Id] AS [Id1]
    FROM [BillDetails] AS [x.BillDetails0]
    INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [dtoBillDetail.Size0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[SizeId] = [dtoBillDetail.Size0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[ProductId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory0] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product0].[CategoryId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [Colors] AS [dtoBillDetail.Color0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[ColorId] = [dtoBillDetail.Color0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [x1].[DateCreated], [x1].[Id]
        FROM [Bills] AS [x1]
        ORDER BY [x1].[DateCreated] DESC, [x1].[Id]
        OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
    ) AS [t0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[BillId] = [t0].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId] = [t1].[Id1]
ORDER BY [t1].[DateCreated] DESC, [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1]" (0723d8ff)

    SELECT [t0].[DateCreated], [t0].[Id], [x.BillDetails0].[Id] AS [Id0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory0].[Id] AS [Id1]
    FROM [BillDetails] AS [x.BillDetails0]
    INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [dtoBillDetail.Size0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[SizeId] = [dtoBillDetail.Size0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[ProductId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product0].[Id]

    INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory0] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product0].[CategoryId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [Colors] AS [dtoBillDetail.Color0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[ColorId] = [dtoBillDetail.Color0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [x1].[DateCreated], [x1].[Id]
        FROM [Bills] AS [x1]
        ORDER BY [x1].[DateCreated] DESC, [x1].[Id]
        OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
    ) AS [t0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[BillId] = [t0].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId] = [t1].[Id1]

    SELECT [t0].[DateCreated], [t0].[Id], [x.BillDetails0].[Id] AS [Id0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory0].[Id] AS [Id1]
    FROM [BillDetails] AS [x.BillDetails0]
    INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [dtoBillDetail.Size0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[SizeId] = [dtoBillDetail.Size0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[ProductId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory0] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product0].[CategoryId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [Colors] AS [dtoBillDetail.Color0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[ColorId] = [dtoBillDetail.Color0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [x1].[DateCreated], [x1].[Id]
        FROM [Bills] AS [x1]
        ORDER BY [x1].[DateCreated] DESC, [x1].[Id]
        OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
    ) AS [t0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[BillId] = [t0].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId] = [t1].[Id1]

""SELECT CASE
    WHEN EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM [Functions] AS [f]
        INNER JOIN [Permissions] AS [p] ON [f].[Id] = [p].[FunctionId]
        INNER JOIN [AspNetRoles] AS [r] ON [p].[RoleId] = [r].[Id]
        WHERE ([r].[Name] IN (N'Admin', N'Staff', N'Customer') AND ([f].[Id] = @__functionId_1)) AND ([p].[CanRead] = 1))

INNER JOIN [Products] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product] ON [x.BillDetails].[ProductId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Id]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product].[CategoryId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Colors] AS [dtoBillDetail.Color] ON [x.BillDetails].[ColorId] = [dtoBillDetail.Color].[Id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [x0].[DateCreated], [x0].[Id]
    FROM [Bills] AS [x0]
    ORDER BY [x0].[DateCreated] DESC, [x0].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t] ON [x.BillDetails].[BillId] = [t].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[DateCreated] DESC, [t].[Id], [x.BillDetails].[Id], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)

        OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
    ) AS [t0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[BillId] = [t0].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId] = [t1].[Id1]

END, [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id1], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[PromotionPrice], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Tags], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Unit], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[ViewCount], [x.BillDetails].[Quantity], CASE
    WHEN [x.BillDetails].[SizeId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.BillDetails].[SizeId], [dtoBillDetail.Size].[Name] AS [Name2]
FROM [BillDetails] AS [x.BillDetails]
INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [dtoBillDetail.Size] ON [x.BillDetails].[SizeId] = [dtoBillDetail.Size].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Products] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product] ON [x.BillDetails].[ProductId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Id]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product].[CategoryId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Colors] AS [dtoBillDetail.Color] ON [x.BillDetails].[ColorId] = [dtoBillDetail.Color].[Id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [x0].[DateCreated], [x0].[Id]
    FROM [Bills] AS [x0]
    ORDER BY [x0].[DateCreated] DESC, [x0].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t] ON [x.BillDetails].[BillId] = [t].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[DateCreated] DESC, [t].[Id], [x.BillDetails].[Id], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)

    ) AS [t0] ON [x.BillDetails0].[BillId] = [t0].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId] = [t1].[Id1]

END, [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [x.Product].[PromotionPrice], [x.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [x.Product].[Tags], [x.Product].[Unit], [x.Product].[ViewCount], [x].[Quantity], CASE

INNER JOIN [Products] AS [x.Product] ON [x].[ProductId] = [x.Product].[Id]

    FROM [ProductQuantities] AS [x0]
    INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [x.Size0] ON [x0].[SizeId] = [x.Size0].[Id]

) AS [t] ON [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId] = [t].[Id0]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]" (0723d8ff)
